results.name: adidas Yeezy Foam RNNR Vermillion (Infants)
results.story: The adidas Yeezy Foam Runner Infants ‘Vermillion’ presents a monochrome colorway of Kanye West’s sneaker-sandal hybrid. The sustainable foam build, made in part with harvested algae, features sculpted lines and a deep crimson finish. Ventilation ports throughout the vamp and side panels deliver breathable comfort, while a textured insole keeps the foot locked in place. The slip-on is underpinned by a contoured outsole equipped with a wavy traction pattern.

results.name: adidas Yeezy QNTM Onyx (Infants)
results.story: The adidas Yeezy Quantum Infants ‘Onyx’ treats the lifestyle silhouette to a stealthy makeover made up of black and dark grey tones. They’re applied to an embroidered mono mesh upper with a synthetic suede overlay at the toe. Black neoprene is utilized on the mid-cut collar, while reflective synthetic paneling reinforces the heel. The sneaker sits atop a full-length Boost midsole, wrapped in a semi-translucent TPU cage and supported by a herringbone-traction rubber outsole.

results.name: adidas Yeezy Slide Glow Green (Infants)
results.story: The adidas Yeezy Slide Infants ‘Glow Green’ pairs an eye-catching one-note finish with a minimalist design built for comfort. A vivid shade of green is applied to the slip-on, crafted from injected EVA foam and equipped with a heel strap for an extra-secure fit. Debossed at the base of the plush footbed, adidas’ Three Stripes logo represents the only bit of exterior branding. The sandal rides on a sawtooth outsole that delivers both grippy traction and impact protection.

results.name: adidas Yeezy Foam RNNR MX Cream Clay (Infants)
results.colorway: MX Cream Clay/MX Cream Clay/MX Cream Clay
results.story: The adidas Yeezy Foam Runner Infants ‘MX Cream Clay’ brings the futuristic slip-on to a new generation of Yeezy enthusiasts. The design features a cream-colored base with brushstroke-like splashes of brown and grey applied throughout the majority of the upper, which is built with a blend of lightweight EVA and ethically sourced algae. The unique silhouette is marked by flowing lines and a series of punched holes that allow for amphibious wear.

results.name: adidas Yeezy Slide Enflame Orange (Infants)
results.story: The adidas Yeezy Slide Infant ‘Enflame Orange’ dresses the minimalist slip-on in a bold citrus hue. The lightweight sandal is crafted from injected EVA foam and features a soft footbed marked with adidas’ three stripes logo, representing the only instance of exterior branding. An adjustable strap wraps around the heel for an extra-secure fit. Underfoot, a series of deep grooves are carved into the outsole, delivering a blend of impact protection and grippy traction.

results.name: adidas Yeezy Foam RNNR Mineral Blue (Infants)
results.story: The adidas Yeezy Foam Runner Infants ‘Mineral Blue’ combines a simple one-note finish with a sculpted foam build. Free of exterior branding, the upper is designed with flowing lines and multiple ventilation ports throughout the vamp and side panels, offering reduced weight and enhanced breathability. Underfoot, a textured sockliner keeps the foot locked in place, while a wavy tread on the outsole similarly provides non-slip traction.

results.name: adidas Yeezy Slide Pure (Infants)
results.story: The adidas Yeezy Slide Infants ‘Pure’ delivers a secure fit, thanks to an EVA foam upper equipped with an adjustable strap that wraps around the back of the heel. The open-toed build is supported by a matching foam outsole with horizontal flex grooves that deliver a smooth ride and enhanced traction. A comfortable fit is provided by a cushy top layer on the footbed, stamped with adidas’ three-stripe logo under the heel.

results.name: adidas ZX 8000 Sean Wotherspoon Superearth (TD)
results.story: Designed in partnership with the Round Two co-founder, the Sean Wotherspoon x adidas ZX 8000 Toddler ‘Super Earth’ is taken from the ‘A-ZX Series,’ a sprawling 26-part release that celebrates the iconic ZX running franchise. The sneaker’s patchwork design draws inspiration from the diversity of the natural world, featuring a mix of plaid fabrics, woven textiles and embroidered florals. A decorative piece depicting Earth as an S-shaped cartoon character is overlaid atop the tongue. Underfoot, the rubber outsole features adidas’ signature Torsion bar for added stability.

results.name: adidas Yeezy QNTM Frozen Blue (Infant)
results.story: The adidas Yeezy Quantum Infants ‘Frozen Blue’ presents a vibrant colorway of Kanye West’s futuristic basketball-inspired sneaker, scaled down and simplified for little feet. No-tie laces secure an a layered knit jacquard upper, enlivened with flowing blue lines that extend from the synthetic suede toe cap to the black neoprene heel/collar. A seamless heel counter extends to the caged Boost midsole, supported by a herringbone-traction rubber outsole.

results.name: adidas Yeezy Boost 380 Onyx (Infants)
results.story: The adidas Yeezy Boost 380 Infants ‘Onyx Non-Reflective’ showcases a camo-like design made up of black and dark brown fibers on the minimalist knit upper, secured with no-tie laces for easy on and off. The lightweight build is mostly unchanged from the men’s edition, featuring a post-dyed monofilament side stripe on the lateral side and a wrapped Boost midsole underfoot. A herringbone traction pattern on the gum rubber outsole provides optimal grip.

results.name: adidas Yeezy 700 V3 Safflower (Infants)
results.story: The adidas Yeezy 700 V3 Infants ‘Safflower’ overlays a glow-in-the-dark RPU cage atop a monofilament engineered mesh upper that’s shot through with flowing yellow lines. A contrasting black bootie and matching laces offer a comfortable fit for little feet, while the PU encapsulated EVA midsole delivers lightweight cushioning with each step. Underfoot, the rubber outsole utilizes a classic herringbone traction pattern for optimal grip.

results.name: adidas Yeezy QNTM Teal Blue (Infants)
results.story: Made for little feet, the adidas Yeezy Quantum Infants ‘Teal Blue’ features the same minimalist build utilized on the men’s release. The one-piece Primeknit upper combines a neutral grey base with black and teal accents, along with reflective silver threads that form wavy lines along the side panel. A two-tone heel cap provides more reflectivity while also cradling the back of the foot. A semi-translucent cage surrounding the full-length Boost midsole delivers a stable ride.

results.name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Carbon (Infants)
results.story: Made for little feet, the adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Infants ‘Carbon’ delivers an entirely neutral colorway of the minimalist sneaker, supported by a full-length Boost midsole encased in semi-translucent rubber. Up top, breathable Primeknit construction blends black, grey and tan yarns for a unique patchwork-like aesthetic. Details include black no-tie elastic laces and a post-dyed monofilament side stripe in a matching black finish.

results.name: adidas Yeezy Boost 380 Pepper (Infants)
results.story: The adidas Yeezy Boost 380 Infants ‘Pepper Non-Reflective’ delivers a subtle colorway of the minimalist lifestyle sneaker for little feet. The multi-toned Primeknit upper, featuring a camo-like pattern in light grey and beige hues, offers a snug, sock-like fit. Semi-translucent orange mesh is woven into the monofilament window, adding enhanced air flow and a flash of color. Soft cushioning arrives via a full-length Boost midsole.
